## Pivot longer

```{r}
mmash %>%
  select(-samples) %>%
  pivot_longer(c(-user_id, -day, -gender)) %>%
  group_by(gender, day, name) %>%
  summarise(across(value, list(
    mean = ~ mean(.x, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd = ~ sd(.x, na.rm = TRUE)
  ))) %>%
  ungroup()
```
